title: Blossom Cascade Earrings: A Symphony of Color and Light
materials: trapezoid) - total carat weight approximately 7.66 carats.
features: Delicate floral motif with a cascading design featuring multi-colored sapphires, each carefully set to maximize brilliance. The rose gold setting provides a warm backdrop, enhancing the vibrancy of the gemstones. The design blends traditional floral aesthetics with a modern, asymmetrical form.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti
or even a sophisticated evening out. These earrings add a touch of elegance to any ensemble.
description: A unique and contemporary design, these earrings are perfect for the modern woman who appreciates traditional craftsmanship. The vibrant sapphires add a pop of color, while the rose gold lends a touch of romance. The meticulous setting ensures durability and longevity, making this a timeless piece to cherish.
